pageContext._xxxcollectionTitlextxt: B0443, University of the State of New York. Board of Regents. Secretary.
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Audiotapes of convocations and Education Department functions, 1952-1970.
pageContext._xxxcollectionNotesxtxt: These audio tapes seem more likely to have been used for internal NYSED purposes, but it is conceivable that some of them may have been broadcast via radio.
